game.name: Unknown 9: Awakening
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 게임 속에서 여러분은 현실과 겹쳐 있는 신비한 차원인 심층을 탐험할 수 있는 능력을 지닌 탐구자 하루나입니다. 강력한 숨겨진 지식을 탐구하는 여정 속에서 하루나는 적대적인 비밀 조직과 싸우기 위해 반드시 심층의 힘을 통달해야 합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You are Haroona, a Quaestor born with the ability to venture into a mysterious dimension: the Fold. On her quest for powerful hidden knowledge, she must learn to master the powers of the Fold to fight a secret society with a hostile agenda.

reviewHighlights.text: A piece of garbage. Please don't waste your money. Don't take my word for it. Just read all the reviews which are mostly negative. The controls are aw...
